Lilly

messages.subject: Re: Slow postings
messages.msgSnippet: I read and post from the website, and I know my stuff is getting posted to the site within minutes.  Now, there might be a lag in the mail servers??? Bridget
messages.messageBody:
I read and post from the website, and I know my stuff is getting
posted to the site within minutes. Now, there might be a lag in the
mail servers???

Bridget

messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] Slow postings
messages.msgSnippet: ... My posts seem to be doing okay today.  Yesterday though I d write something and sometimes it showed up right away and other times it took hours to get
messages.messageBody:
Katy Clark wrote:
>
> I'm writing and posting this at 5:49 p.m. (Central time) on Wednesday. When do y'all get it? Is it just me or does it seem like it's taking a lot longer for things to post than it used to? YahooGroups moved the server alright...to Timbuktu!! :(
>

My posts seem to be doing okay today. Yesterday though I'd write something
and sometimes it showed up right away and other times it took hours to get
there. Something is whacky right now - could be Yahoo or it could be
the web - maybe a major router is down.

It's 4:02 here now (pacific time) so it did take some time to get thru.

--

Cindy Ferguson
crma@...

messages.subject: Slow postings
messages.msgSnippet: I m writing and posting this at 5:49 p.m. (Central time) on Wednesday. When do y all get it?  Is it just me or does it seem like it s taking a lot longer for
messages.messageBody:
I'm writing and posting this at 5:49 p.m. (Central time) on Wednesday. When do y'all get it? Is it just me or does it seem like it's taking a lot longer for things to post than it used to? YahooGroups moved the server alright...to Timbuktu!! :(

Just checking.

Katy C.
